verses.roman:
dhāñā yāyena prabhu, strī āche alpa dūre
strī gāya' bali' govinda prabhure kailā kole

synonyms: dhāñā—very hastily; yāyena—was going; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; strī—the woman; āche—was; alpa dūre—within a short distance; strī gāya'-a woman is singing; bali'-saying; govinda—His personal servant; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā kole—held in his arms.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was running very rapidly, and the girl was only a short distance away. Just then Govinda caught the Lord in his arms and cried, "It is a woman singing!"
